name: Montana Silvertip
description: Montana Silvertip is a Granddaddy Purple and Super Silver Haze hybrid cross that inherits the name of its homeland. Typical medical applications for Montana Silvertip include ADD/ADHD, migraines, and anxiety.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Talkative, Tingly, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Inflammation, Muscle Spasms, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Headache
